name: Samarth Singh Chauhan

responsibilities: CRM UI/functionality, implemented role-based security, and managed accounts/contacts. Demonstrated leadership by resolving team issues
Specialized in sales forecasting using SQL, Tableau, Power BI, and Excel to create strategic reports and dashboards Doing Data visualization.
Integrated models for opportunity pipeline and sales forecasting. Implemented AI-assisted email marketing with NLP, showcasing teamwork in CRM API integration.

description: Implemented NLP techniques for sentiment analysis using NLTK, TextBlob, and Transformer models.
Developed and evaluated machine learning models for sentiment classification.
Integrated state-of-the-art Transformer models from Hugging Face for enhanced performance.
Created comprehensive visualizations and reports to communicate findings effectively.

projects.project_name: Aircraft Tyre Defect and Health Detection System
description: Developed a high-precision system using computer vision and machine learning for aircraft tire defect detection.
Integrated forecasting of tire health and remaining useful life for proactive maintenance.
Utilized Python, OpenCV, TensorFlow, and Keras for defect classification and image enhancement.
Ensured seamless integration between defect detection and predictive maintenance for enhanced aviation safety and efficiency.
Curated datasets and used advanced visualization for predictive health monitoring and maintenance strategies.
Conducted comprehensive EDA on Airbnb data to understand pricing trends and factors influencing reservations.
Cleaned and processed data, addressing missing values and transforming features for machine learning.
Visualized insights using matplotlib and seaborn, highlighting seasonal price variations and feature correlations.
Applied Random Forest and XGBoost models to predict Airbnb prices based on accommodation details, host attributes, and seasonal trends.
Achieved high model accuracy (Random Forest R^2 = 0.981, XGBoost R^2 = 0.918), demonstrating proficiency in data analysis, cleaning, visualization, and machine learning.
Using Web Scraping, Python, Pandas, and Power BI

certifications: Google Advanced Data Analytics Professional Certificate
Career Essentials in Business Analysis by Microsoft
extracurricular: Contributed as a team member in organizing the 2022 National E-Summit, 'Vishwapreneur'.
Core team member of CyberCell VIIT and organized an International CTF Competition which had a prize pool of 1 lakh.
